arrify

Convert a value to an array

Install 

$ npm install --save arrify

Usage 

const arrify = require('arrify');

arrify('unicorn');
//=> ['unicorn']

arrify(['unicorn']);
//=> ['unicorn']

arrify(null);
//=> []

arrify(undefined);
//=> []

Supplying null or undefined results in an empty array.
